alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:17AM CST until January 30 at 7:12PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Sumter, Marengo and Greene Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1230 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 101.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 94.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 101.9 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
